Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oAn EA of this work appeared in ICALP'08. The arXiv v2 contains an appendix with some sketches of proofs. To date, complete proofs can only be found in thePhD of M. Tedder and spread over several chapters. This is the
first self-contained version. To ease the understanding, the noveI presentation enlights the combinatorial objects involved in the algorithm, which still relies on the same ideas\u00a7r
